Detailed Description

The core thread class.

Should not be used standalone. Needs to be inherited by another class, with the function CoreThread::Process overridden.

Definition at line 58 of file core_thread.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum CrissCross::System::CoreThread::ThreadAffinity

Thread affinity specification.

Specifies what CPU the thread should be allowed to run on.

Enumerator:
CPU_ANY  Allows the thread to run on any CPU available.
CPU_ZERO  Allows the thread to run only on the first CPU.
CPU_ONE  Allows the thread to run only on the second CPU.
CPU_TWO  Allows the thread to run only on the third CPU.
CPU_THREE  Allows the thread to run only on the fourth CPU.

Definition at line 78 of file core_thread.h.

Definition at line 97 of file core_thread.h.

void* CrissCross::System::CoreThread::m_threadParams

The parameter to be passed to the thread.

Can be a pointer to a struct, a class, or whatever other information may be needed by CoreThread::Process during the thread's execution.

Definition at line 110 of file core_thread.h.

Currently unused.
